0.0.3.name: wordpress/reply-w-comment-preview
0.0.3.description:
This plugin allows you to add Twitter-like @reply links to comments, including a preview of the comment replied to. When clicked, those links insert the author name and a link to the comment you are replying to in the textarea, and adds a Preview of the original comment to the @Reply (on hover using javascript).

This is a MASHUP of this and that
